item.title: A new old project
item.description: In 2018, I engaged in a project, hired by a small environmental consultancy firm, to develop a web application (R Shiny). The idea was to simply automate part of their typical data processing workflow, for time-saving purposes, and develop a few data vizualization elements to assist in their reporting. As the subject area was not unfamiliar to me, I could confidently go one step further and help improving the workflow per se, including designing and implementing new metrics and processes.
